11.content:
{}- designates thoughts
~ ~ -designates telepathy, like through a bond

It was just another day around Capsule Corporation, or so it seemed, as Bulma Briefs drove towards her home from work. {Man, what a hard day...can't believe they held me over, I'm soo hungry...} Just then, as if by her thoughts, she saw a man on the curb with a stand of fruits. {Hm...I could go for something to eat...but only fruits, I gotta watch my figure or Veggie will probably hate me..} So, she parked her Capsule Hover near the curbside, got out, and walked up to the rather dirty looking man near the fruit stand. "Excuse me..do you run this fruit stand?" She asked politely. He smiled at her, his teeth practically rotting out of his mouth. "Why yes..yes I do, are you interested in something to eat Ms...?" "Briefs." "Ms. Briefs?" "Actually.." she looked over what he had, all of the food looking delicious. "I could go for something sweet...how about this?" She picked up a very large, sweet smelling pear. He nodded, "Ahh..yes..very good for those with a sweet tooth." "Right..so how much?" He waved a hand dismisivly. "It's on the house...just don't eat it too quickly." "What could possibly happen?" She said, with a chuckle. "But thanks, anywho for the free fruit." "It's not a problem, Ms. Briefs..." she started to walk away, and he said under his breath, "Anything to help you become a pear.." He smirked, and he and the fruit stand disappeared as a car passed by...
Bulma hopped into the car, and started driving home, as she bit into the pear. {My Kami! This is great! It's like a candy bar...wow..} In no more than a minute, the entire thing was gone, only the core being left over, and that wsa even in halves. Bulma burped, and patted her stomach. "Aaahh...that hits the spot.." She said to herself. She shifted in the seat of the car, it seeming slightly uncomfortable for some reason. "Huh...leather must've expanded from the heat.." She shrugged, and stopped the car right infront of her house. As she went to get out of the car, she noticed her legs were just barely missing the steering wheel. {Did it lower itself somehow?...} She frowned, and tried to push the steering wheel up. To her astonishment, it was as high as it could go. {Must be a trick of the light...} She shook her head, and got out of the capsule car. She started to walk into the house, noticing that for some reason, something kept brushing against her thighs. She frowned, looked down, and gasped. Her thighs had become quite large, now rubbing against each other inside her too small skirt. {What the?..What's..going on?} She fumbled with the keys, and opened the door up. She walked into the deserted house, "Good..no one's home.." She shut the door behind her, only to feel it hit her on the rear! "What in the.." {I've never done that before..} She looked behind herself to see that her butt had expanded into a rather large shelf! The door had hit her rear, as it was slightly inside the doorway. Bulma looked like she had seen a ghost. She turned around, and shut the door proper, locking it. She walked over to a mirror, and turned sideways, shocked to see what she did. Her rear had distended away from the small of her back, indeed giving her about a 2 inch shelf where it just jutted out. She put a hand on her rear, just to make sure it was actually there not a trick from the lighting. Sure enough, it was her butt, she could feel her hand resting on it. And to top it off, it was really soft, almost like dough. {My word..am I getting fat!?} She turned and faced the mirror at the front, to see her hips were also abit larger. Possibly 2 inches on each side. "Oh my God..." And her thighs were also bigger, it hadn't just been the lighting outside. She poked her thigh, her finger going in abit. "I am getting fat..and bottom heavy at that...Kami, what's Vegeta going to think? Or the kids?..." Just then, she heard the door downstairs open...

113121.content:
A large room decorated in what appeared to be evil wizard decor, complete with arcane symbols on the floor and a large cauldron bubbling in the center of the room.

"Welcome to castle Babidee," the evil magician said, smiling at Bulma, "located on a planet so remote I doubt Vegeta has even heard about. Please, take a seat." In a puff of smoke, a large comfortable looking chair appeared behind Bulma.

"So what do you plan to do now?" Bulma asked, settling her large rear into the chair. "You still going to try fattening me till I burst? It won't work, and besides, someone will rescue me, and then you'll have a problem."

"There are two things you should understand right from the start," Babidee said, smiling evilly. "First, simply because something is beyond the reach of science, doesn't mean it is beyond the power of magic. Second, even if someone knew you where gone, there's so many cloaking spells around this place that they wouldn't even know this place existed if they hadn't already seen it. Not to mention the fact that we're in the middle of nowhere. You're at my mercy, tubby, so I would suggest you drop the lip."

"I still don't know why you aren't going after the Buu," Bulma retorted, "it seems to me he's the one who killed you. Besides, from what I saw you were pretty weak."

"That he did," Babidee conceded, "but Vegeta stranded me on Earth, thereby forcing me to stay on Earth and allow Buu time to turn on me. However, I was only weak because releasing Buu took a great deal of energy, and I no longer suffer from that problem, plus the fact this castle is built on a powerful energy nexus."

"I still think you're a fool," Bulma said, patting her stomach as it growled again, "but if your going to feed me hurry up and do it so I don't have to listen to you anymore."

"Poor Bulma," Babidee chuckled walking around the chair, "you will be so fun to torture. Do you know why I choose that particular spell to use on you?" Babidee poked her large stomach as he spoke, his finger sinking deep. "Because I knew you dreaded getting fat, not only because you fear Vegeta will lose interest in you, but also because you worked hard to maintain your figure and are very vain."

"I know Veggie would still like me," Bulma stated, trying to hide the small doubt in her voice, "no matter how much I weigh."

"Come now," Babidee laughed, "you can't lie to me about Vegeta's character! He was mine for a while, and I know all his weaknesses, his flaws, his fears. Though if your so sure, we could see how Vegeta reacts to you now. Or perhaps I should just allow you to ease that hunger that's gnawing at you, provide you with a feast, allowing part of you to watch yourself gorge, growing fatter by the minute, knowing you can do nothing till you burst. Which to choose? This is always the hardest part of torture, choosing the method, but I think I know which one I'll use."

12.content:
It was nearing 3 in the morning on a small island in the middle of the ocean, the only thing visible on it save a few palm trees was a house with large letters spelling out the word 'Kame' on the front. The night was peaceful, as most nights were on the island of the old martial arts master, his pet turtle, his student Krillen, and Krillen's wife and daughter. However, inside the house, or more specifically, the attic, not all was perfectly silent.

The trapdoor leading to the Kame house attic squeaked slightly as it was opened from below. A blond haired woman with piercing blue eyes climbed up into the fairly large storage space with almost inhumane grace. Number 18 glanced around the attic and began to check out the various boxes and storage containers that laid about in the old man's attic. The reason the svelte android was up in the middle of the night and in the attic was rather simple: she was bored. Being a cyborg, she did not need to sleep as much as regular humans did, so she often found herself spending part of the night looking for something to do until her family woke up in the morning.

"Perhaps there is something interesting up here," 18 thought to herself as she browsed through the piles of boxes, full of things the 300+ year old man had collected, and probably forgotten he owned, not least of which were several boxes with the words 'Roshi's collection' written on the sides. 18 was about to give up and look for something else to occupy her mind for the next few hours when something promising caught her eye...
12.title: In the Turtle Hermit's Attic

121111.content:
"As you may or may not know," Master Roshi started, sitting down, "both Shin and I were disciples of the great Mutaito, over 300 years ago. Now, in the beginning, Shin and I were not rivals, but instead close friends, almost like brothers, like Goku and Krillen are now." Roshi stopped and sighed as he remembered the old days.

"Then what happened to start the rivalry," Krillen asked as 18 was in the process of cleaning out the fridge. "Honey, you really should be listening to Master Roshi."

"I am," 18 replied as she swallowed a piece of leftover pizza, "he and this Shin guy were friends, go on." She then shoved another slice in her mouth and bent over to continue snacking, her widening rear straining her pants.

"Basically, Shin was jealous of my strength as a fighter," Roshi continued, his expression sad. "I was always a slightly better warrior then he was, and he felt Mutaito favored me over him, which was false. This shattered our friendship, so he sought revenge."

"That doesn't explain why 18 is making a pig of herself," Oolong interrupted.

"I'm getting to that bacon boy, so don't interrupt," Roshi replied glaring at Oolong. "Anyway, Shin decided to try and use the skills at which he excelled to remove me from the picture. You see, Mutaito was not just a fighter, but also a powerful physic and a wizard as well. He choose pupils who possessed attributes of all three talents. Shin always was a great physic and was quite adept at magic, though I was the only one who mastered the mafuba attack used on evil Piccolo, and through this skill he sought to take mastery of this third skill from me. He crafted this special bottle, and used his magic to make it always partially full of a liquid that caused the drinker to be cursed with an insatiable appetite and to gain weight quickly and easily. He did all this in secret and offered me the bottle under the guise it would increase my somewhat meager physic powers. Fortunately, my sister Baba came to warn me of Shin trick and I took the bottle to Mutaito, who then cast Shin out. Neither my sister or Mutiato could destroy the bottle nor remove the curse, so I kept it with me to keep it safe."

"Why didn't you just ditch the thing in the ocean?" Oolong asked.

"Because it is generally bad to allow the chance of letting a cursed object fall into innocent hands," Master Roshi replied.

"So," Krillen asked, looking at 18 who had managed to clean out the fridge and was searching for more food, "what can we do now?"

"Well," Roshi said, rubbing his chin in thought, "I figure we have two options. One, we can try and find Shin and have him remove the curse. Two we gather the dragon balls and ask Shenlong for help. Neither one will be easy."

"Then we better hurry and get started," Krillen said, as a loud rip was heard as 18 bent over to check a bottom cabinet, her pants giving up the ghost. "After we find something for 18 to wear."

13.content:
Chi-Chi sighed and looked herself over in the mirror, turning to look at herself from different angles. There was simply no getting around it, she was gaining weight. Not a great deal of weight, maybe just 5 or 10 pounds, but for the martial artist turned home maker, it was a problem.

"I must be picking up Goku's bad habits," Chi-Chi thought, poking a finger into the thin layer of fat on her usually flat stomach. "More specific his bad eating habits."

This was true, with her husband neither dead or training for some future threat, Goku had been spending more time at home with his wife, something he hadn't been able to do a lot of since their son Gohan was young. While Chi-Chi loved having Goku around the house spending time with her, that meant that she spent a lot of time in the kitchen cooking, which led to her snacking which led to some extra pounds of fat.
Not that she thought the weight looked bad on her, her face had softened slightly and her bust and hips were a little fuller as well. She even kind of enjoyed letting go and eating more, not worrying about how she would look when Goku got back.

"I wonder if Goku has noticed?" Chi-Chi thought as she started getting dressed. "If he did, would he even mention it or care? Do I even really care? Maybe I should ask Goku what he thinks about this." Her stomach growled softly, interrupting her thoughts. "Maybe I should go have a snack first and then think of a plan."

It was a relatively peaceful time in the world for the Z Fighters, two years had passed since Majin Buu's defeat (Kid Buu specifically) and there was virtually no crime or evil villains anywhere.

Still Videl was unhappy. She and her boyfriend Gohan were ready to take things one step further and get married, but Hercule had forbidden it.

"Sorry Videl, but your not ready for the hardships that come with marriage yet, and you can't depend on that boy forever." He told her. "When your as tough as your old man, then you'll have my permission."

Of course, Videl knew that him challenging her was an excuse so that Hercule wouldn't have to face Gohan, but she would do it anyway.

The only time Hercule would be forced to fight her without weaseling his way out of it would be in the World Martial Arts Tournament.

The only problem was that she'd have to eventually fight Buu, since he always entered as Hercule's apprentice.

Even if she trained hard, the gap was impossible to overcome...Unless she went to some other sources for help.

That's why she had come to Bulma's house and was waiting in her lab.

Soon enough, Bulma arrived. "So what brings you to my lab Videl?"

"Well Bulma, I need to know something...Gohan, his brother, his dad, Vegeta, and Trunks are all "Saiyans" right?"

"Yes, but technically only Goku and Vegeta are full blooded Saiyans. Why?"

"I already know their incredibly strong. I want to know if you can make me into one."

"What?! Wh-why?" Bulma asked, becoming scared.

"I need to be stronger so that I can face Buu, to fight my Dad later...Please Bulma? Gohan's already training with me so I can use Ki, but it's not enough."

Bulma could see that Videl was quite serious, and desperately needed help. This moved her to make her next decision.

"Okay."
142222.title: A battle for Hercule's approval

choices: Videl & Gohan start talking about training, but her hunger gets the best of her
As Videl eats, her tail begins to grow, and her body expands
1422221.content:
After she had given Videl permission, Bulma returned with a small syringe filled with what looked like metal slime.

"This is a kind of nanite that'll infuse Saiyan DNA into your own, making you into the equivalent of a half-Saiyan." The blue haired scientist said as she injected the microscopic robot's into the feisty crime fighter.

"Gee thanks Bulma, but how did you make these so fast?"

"I had these made years ago, in case Chi-Chi or I needed to be able to fight. That was her sample, made from Goku's DNA, but I doubt she'll mind."

"I hope not, Gohan told me she can be a little testy sometimes." Videl admitted, making both women laugh. After the moment passed, The raven haired girl had a question. "How will I know when it's completely in my system?"

"Well, you'll grow a tail." Bulma said, looking apologetically at Videl who was merely confused.

"Why? Gohan and the others don't have one."

"They used to. All Saiyans do, unless it gets cut off, it shouldn't bother you though. At first it'll be a weak point, but with enough training it'll actually help you...Just make sure you don't look at the moon during the night."

"I promise not to." The young woman said before her watch went off. "Oh I'm late for a date! Thanks Bulma, I'll be going now."

"Bye Videl, see you later!"

Little did the two women realize, that one gene that Bulma had overlooked in the DNA sample contained Goku's insatiable appetite, which when mixed with Videl's natural genetic code, would have an unknown result.

Although her new Saiyan strength had yet to surface, Videl could already feel an intensive hunger overtake her.

As she flew adove West City, she saw the local barbeque place where she and her boyfriend were to meet.

Gohan was already there, waving as she came down.

"Videl, you made it." The first half-saiyan said, hugging her.

"Of course I did Gohan, now come on...I'm starving." She said after a quick laugh. She practically dragged Gohan inside.
1422221.title: Videl's grown stronger and...bigger?

14222212.content:
When they were seated, Gohan and Videl began to lookover their menus.

Normally, the cerulean eyed brawler rarely splurged on food, normally under a strict diet. This time however, she felt like she deserved a little extra food.

When the waiter came, her boyfriend ordered a large bowl of rice with barbecued chicken, slathered with sauce.

When the server came to Videl, she made up her mind.

"I'll have three orders of his meal, two extra large pork sandwiches, some noodles, and three large fries with a large soda." Videl said smiling. Both Gohan and the stranger were flabbergasted, but the man left to fetch the food.

After a moment Gohan spoke. "Gee Videl, I never knew you ate so much."

"I usually don't...I'm just extra hungry today." Videl said, her belly seconding the statement. "But I need to stay strong for the tournament."

"Speaking of that, are you sure about entering? You'll have to fight Buu and only me, Gotenks, my dad, maybe Vegeta can take him."

"Don't worry, I have something planned." Videl said smiling, "And if it works I might be able to match you."

Gohan was curious as to what she meant. "Well, do you want my help training?"

"No thanks, I don't want to ruin the surprise." Videl said before she felt a tugging at her backside before a loud "rip." She looked down to see her new, long monkey-like tail. She let out a quiet: "Oh."

"What was that?" Gohan asked, but before Videl could answer, the food arrived.

"Umm, let's eat first."

Letting it drop, the lovebirds began to eat, Gohan ate at his normal pace, but Videl was devouring the food rapidly, with the kind of avarice remniscient of Goku's own. Her hands moved faster than the eye could follow, forcing food into her petite maw. Within thirty minutes, she had consumed all of her food, and ordered twice as much, only to consume it in half the time.

"Aah, I'm stuffed." Videl said, patting her stomach.

Shortly after, Gohan flew her home and she went to bed.

The next morning, Videl felt a little different than normal.

She had had a hard time sleeping the last night, her clothes had felt like they were constricting her, and her tail kept getting in the way, and when she tried to wrap her tail around her waist it felt funny.

When she got up, her bed gave a strange creak.

"Weird, this bed's brand new." The daughter of Hercule thought, when she looked down at the bed, she saw that her belly was protruding...alot.

When she looked in the mirror she screamed, a rare thing for her to do.

Her entire body was caked with layer upon layer of fat. Her face, once small and dainty was now full and round. Three chins had appeared under her first one, and her cheeks were plump and quite rosy looking, giving her the appearance of being jolly. Her body had an all around apple shape. Her breasts and belly were were so prominent that she could barely see her lower body by looking down. Her mammaries were now an estimated G-cup size, stretching the fabric of her bra, until a snap was heard, followed by a jiggling sensation. Her belly had a tire shape, accompanied by numerous love handles. Her thunder thighs and rear were quite prominent, the of her size rump was titanic, as big as a pair of basketballs, making her panties (which were barely intact and barely hidden by her now higher nightgown) stretch to their limits. Even her tail was fatter, grown so that it could fit around her elaphantine hips.

"I can't let anyone see me like this!" Videl said as she looked for an escape route. She saw her window and took a leap, getting caught in it until she used her strength to hert her massive body out. There were a few cracks in the wall from how much force she had used, but it was barely troubling.

As she flew back to WestCity from her home, the tomboy could only wonder if Bulma knew what was going on.

Shortly she arrived and knocked on the woman's door. Bulma answered, but didn't recognize her.

"Huh, can I help you?"

"YES YOU CAN HELP ME BULMA!!" Videl yelled, picking her friend up by her dress. The tomboyish fighter's aura was glowing a bright gold color. Soon her hair began to glow gold, and in a flash of light, it had begun to stand up on end. She had become a super saiyan, but had become as fat as Broly was burly. Despite her new found power, she was very angry. "WHAT DID YOU DO TO ME?"

"Wha-? I-I've never even me-" Bulma began, when she really looked at Videl's face, and saw her features, and then looked at the Saiyan tail. "V...Videl?"

"Yeah it's me!" She cried, now the ground was shaking and rocks were rising, Vegeta and Trunks came out, sensing the threat.

"Bulma, what's going on?" Vegeta asked, he and his son glaring at the mammoth of a girl before them. He felt as if he had sensed her aura somewhere...but it felt mixed with another one. "Is this..another Saiyan?"

"No Vegeta, this is a friend of mine..Vi...Vivian...You two go back inside."

"Hmph. Fine, but we'll be keeping our eyes on her." Vegeta huffed as he and his offspring left.

After they left, Bulma let out a sigh. "Videl, I'm not sure what happened, let's take you to the lab and we'll find out...but you need new clothes first." She said, before the two headed off.

A couple hours later, Videl was sitting in an industrial strength chair wearing a version of Saiyan armor that Bulma had synthesized. It resembled the kind that Vegeta wore during the Cell games, but the spandex (which revealed every embarrassing curve on Videl's body) was black, while the actual armor was pink and white. She had managed to return to normal, shedding the transformation powered weight. All she could do is sit, worry, and wonder when lunch was coming.

Finally Bulma hadreturned to the room, looking fearful.

"Umm Videl, I have some bad news."

"What is it Bulma?"

"Well, according to this diagnosis..."

154322221121.content:
Cabba the young universe six super saiyan stood a little dumbfounded at his teammate and fellow saiyan Caulifa. Then again when it came to the saiyan woman a lot of things she did left him dumbfounded.

"So tell me again what this plan of yours is?"

Caulifa sighed as she shot him a sharp glare, "Cabba you dolt, listen to me one last time. To beat those U7 guys you were telling me about and any other universe out there then I'm going to build up my endurance and energy big time!"

"And that means...stuffing yourself silly?"

"No you idiot! All that force feeding is going to build my endurance and afterwards I'm going to have a tremendous amount of build-in energy. You already saw what I can do as a Super Saiyan now imagine if I go even beyond that!"

Caulifa chuckled as she smirked in proud fashion, for a moment Cabba's thoughts went to the blue-haired forms of the U7 saiyans...he nearly shuttered at the thought of Caulifa with that "blue" power...

"Okay that's good and all but...why involve Kale as well?!"

The young saiyan stated pointing over at the shy and very reserved girl standing some feet away from the two of them.

"She's my training partner, duh."

Somehow Cabba felt that Kale hadn't really been given a chance to refuse then again he wasn't really surprised that the shy saiyan agreed she and Caulifa seemed to have some of kind of close relationship, he still had the bumps and bruises to prove it after all.

"So she's going to feed you?" he asked, Kale turning away slightly as her cheeks briefly lit up.

"No, what part of "training partner" do you not understand. I'm going to get stronger and so is my protegee! So you're going to be bringing us meal after meal. Now get to it, Cabba!"

He wanted to argue but knew it was useless so with a deep sigh Cabba simply resigned himself to his fate.

Later Caulifa and Kale sat near one another, the former rubbing her hands together at the numerous plates she spotted Cabba bringing in their direction nearly laughing at the young saiyan's struggle to maintain his balance while at at the same time also chewing him out to not drop any of their food.

Cabba muttering something under his breath while Kale simply sat silent only smiling briefly after Caulifa had turned over in her direction and flashed a big toothy grin.

"Alright Kale lets feed ourselves like crazy and get super strong!"

info.brief_description: Pick a DBZ girl, and help her grow!
info.description:
This is a story, where a girl from Dragon Ball Z grows nice and fat. You'll have several choices, but remeber, please keep this PG. No sex, no blood and gore, etc.

And no one sentence posts. Try to go for a paragraph or two. If I see any of the above, I WILL delete it. So just remember that.
